item.title: Online Courses
item.description: Preview Image Citation Online Courses There are many great online learning platforms that provide various elementary and advanced courses of R/Data science/R-packages. Most of those courses is free, but you can also choose some charged courses for specific needs or pay for a verified certificate of the courses. edx online courses edX is a free online course project jointly created by Harvard University and MIT. The purpose is to establish a joint education platform for the world’s top universities, improve the quality of teaching, and promote online education online.
